channel.title: wsgiref on 卡塞尔的博客

item.title: django wsgiref
item.description: django 封装模型采用 wsgiref 模块 from wsgiref.simple_server import make_server def routers(): # URLConf 配置 urlpatterns = ( ('/book', foo), ('/web', bar), ) return urlpatterns def foo(x): return [b'<h1>Hello, book</h1>'] def bar(x): return [b'<h1>Hello, web</h1>'] def application(environ, start_response): start_response('200 OK', [('Content-Type', 'text/html')]) urlpatterns = routers() path = environ['PATH_INFO'] # http://127.0.0.1:8000/book func = None for item in urlpatterns: if item[0] == path: func = item[1] break
